ns2:data.ns2:text: الروذراوری, أبی شجاع محمد بن الحسین، ظهیر الدین.
Ruḏrawarī, Abu Šuǧaʿ Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥusayn.
Rūdhrāwardī, Abū Shujāʻ Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥusayn, 1045 or 1046-1095.
‏روذراوردي، أبو شجاع محمد بن الحسين،‏ 1045 or 1046-1095.

The eclipse of the ʿAbbasid Caliphate : classical writings of the medieval Islamic world.

al-Ǧuzʾ al-ṯāmin min Tārīḵ Abī al-Ḥusayn Hilāl b. al-Muḥsin b. Ibrāhīm al-Ṣābī al-kātib ; wa-huwa yaḥtawī ʿalā ḵams sinīn awwaluhā sanat 389 wa-āḵiruhā sanat 393 hiǧriyya, alḥaqnāhu bi-Ḏayl al-wazīr Abī Šuǧāʿ li-kawnihā ka-al-takammula
rules and regulations of the ʿAbbāsid court
